Theory syntaxsemantics

theory syntaxsemantics
imports Main "Regular-Sets.Regular_Exp" "HOL-Library.Omega_Words_Fun"
begin

text ‹We extend ‹rexp› by adding a constructor ‹Acts›, representing a set of actions.
In this way regular expressions are inherently finite›

fun Actslist :: "'a list ⇒ 'a rexp " where
"Actslist [] = Zero" |
"Actslist (a # as) = Plus (Actslist as) (Atom a)"

definition Acts :: "'a set ⇒ 'a rexp" where
"Acts A = Actslist (if finite A then (SOME listA. set listA = A) else undefined)"

lemma Actslistlang : "lang (Actslist A) =  {[a] |a. a ∈ set A}"
  by (induct A; auto)

lemma Actslang [simp] : "finite A ⟹ lang (Acts A) =  {[a] |a. a ∈ A}"
  apply (simp add: Acts_def Actslistlang)
  apply (rule someI2_ex; simp add: finite_list)
  done

lemma abinconc : "a ∈ A ∧ b ∈ B ⟹ a@b ∈ A@@B"
  using concat_def by blast

lemma exists_abinconc : "(ab ∈ A@@B) = (∃a b. ab = a@b ∧ a ∈ A ∧ b ∈ B)"
  by blast

lemma exists_map_abinconc : "(map f ab ∈ A@@B) = (∃a b. ab = a@b ∧ (map f a) ∈ A ∧ (map f b) ∈ B)"
  apply (rule iffI)
  apply (metis exists_abinconc append_eq_map_conv)
  apply (metis abinconc map_append)
  done

lemma negcupcap : "- ⋃ {S'. P S'} = ⋂ {S'. P (-S')}"
  apply auto
proof-
  fix s S'
  assume assum1: "∀S'. P (- S') ⟶ s ∈ S'"
  assume assum2: "s ∈ S'"
  assume "P S'"
  hence "P (- (-S'))" by auto
  hence "s ∈ -S'" using assum1 by blast
  thus False using assum2 by auto
qed

text ‹A mu calculus formula is defined on a type of actions ‹'a›,
and de Bruijn indices are used as variables.›

datatype 'a formula =
  tt | ff | var nat |
  neg "'a formula" |
  and' "'a formula" "'a formula" | 
  or "'a formula" "'a formula" | 
  box 'a "'a formula" |
  diamond 'a "'a formula" |
  nu "'a formula" |
  mu "'a formula"

datatype example_states = s⇩0 | s⇩1
datatype example_actions = 𝖺 | 𝖻 | 𝖼

value "diamond 𝖻 (box 𝖺 tt) :: example_actions formula"
value "nu (var 0) :: example_actions formula "

text ‹Similarly a labeled transition system is defined on a type of actions ‹'a› 
and a type of states ‹'s› (instead of a set of actions and a set of states).
A labeled transition system then consists of a set of transitions and a set of initial states.›

(*maybe remove set of initial states*)
record ('a, 's) lts =
transition :: "('s × 'a × 's) set"
initial :: "'s set"

text ‹A record can be instantiated as follows.›

definition example_lts :: "(example_actions, example_states) lts" where
"example_lts ≡ ⦇transition = {(s⇩0, 𝖼, s⇩0), (s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩1)}, initial = {s⇩0}⦈"

text ‹An environment is updated by shifting all variable mappings to the right, i.e.
‹newenvironment e S' (Suc i) = e i›.›

abbreviation newenvironment :: "(nat ⇒ 's set) ⇒ 's set ⇒ (nat ⇒ 's set) " where
"newenvironment e S' ≡ S' ## e"

text ‹Some simplifications for ‹newenvironment›, specifically with respect to updating the environment.›

lemma newenvironmentsuccessorcomplement [simp] : 
"(newenvironment e S')((Suc i) := - ((newenvironment e S') (Suc i))) = newenvironment (e(i := - e i)) S'"
  apply (rule)
  apply (induct_tac x; simp)
  done

lemma newenvironmentzerocomplement [simp] : 
"(newenvironment e S')(0 := (-(newenvironment e S') 0)) = newenvironment e (-S')"
  apply (rule)
  apply (induct_tac x; simp)
  done

lemma newenvironmentswitchsuccessor [simp] : 
"newenvironment (e(i :=  S')) S'' = (newenvironment e S'')((Suc i) := S')"
  apply (rule)
  apply (induct_tac x; simp)
  done

lemma newenvironmentswitchzero [simp] : 
"(newenvironment e S'')(0 := S') = newenvironment e S'"
  apply (rule)
  apply (induct_tac x; simp)
  done

text ‹With the definition of ‹newenvironment›, we define the semantics of formulas.›

fun formulasemantics :: "'a formula  ⇒ ('a, 's) lts ⇒ (nat ⇒ 's set) ⇒ 's set" (‹⟦_⟧ _ _› [80, 80, 80] 80)
where 
  "⟦tt⟧ M e = UNIV " |
  "⟦ff⟧ M e =  {}" |
  "⟦var X⟧ M e  = e X" |
  "⟦neg f⟧ M e = -(⟦f⟧ M e)" |
  "⟦and' f f'⟧ M e = ⟦f⟧ M e ∩ ⟦f'⟧ M e" |
  "⟦or f f'⟧ M e = ⟦f⟧ M e ∪ ⟦f'⟧ M e" |
  "⟦diamond act f⟧ M e = {s. ∃ s'. (s, act, s') ∈ (transition M) ∧ s'∈ ⟦f⟧ M e}" |
  "⟦box act f⟧ M e = {s. ∀ s'. (s, act, s') ∈ (transition M) ⟶  s'∈ ⟦f⟧ M e}" |
  "⟦nu f⟧ M e = ⋃ {S'. S' ⊆ ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')}" |
  "⟦mu f⟧ M e = ⋂ {S'. S' ⊇ ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')}"

text ‹We can prove the evaluation of semantics of formulas on the example as given before.›

lemma "⟦box 𝖺 ff⟧ example_lts e = {s⇩0}"
  apply (simp add: example_lts_def)
  using example_states.exhaust apply auto
  done

lemma "⟦nu (diamond 𝖺 (var 0))⟧ example_lts e = {s⇩1}"
proof-
  have "∀S'. S' ⊆ {s. ∃s'. ((s = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩0) ∨ (s = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩1)) ∧ s' ∈ S'} = (S' = {} ∨ S' = {s⇩1})" using example_states.exhaust by auto
  hence "⋃ {S'. S' ⊆ {s. ∃s'. ((s = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩0) ∨ (s = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩1)) ∧ s' ∈ S'}} = {s⇩1}" by auto
  thus ?thesis by (simp add: example_lts_def)
qed

lemma "⟦nu (diamond 𝖺 (var 0))⟧ example_lts e = {s⇩1}"
  apply (simp add: example_lts_def)
  apply (rule equalityI)
  apply blast
  apply (rule Union_upper)
  apply auto
  done

text ‹‹shiftup› is defined on formulas to be able to wrap a formula in a new binder 
without changing its definition. For example, ‹var 0› and ‹mu (var 1)› represent the same formula.
‹shiftdown› is its opposite.›

fun shiftup :: "'a formula ⇒ nat ⇒ 'a formula "
where 
  "(shiftup tt i) = tt " |
  "(shiftup ff i) = ff" |
  "(shiftup (var X) i)  = (if X < i then var X else var (X + 1))" |
  "(shiftup (neg f) i) = neg (shiftup f i)" |
  "(shiftup (and' f f') i) = and' (shiftup f i) (shiftup f' i) " |
  "(shiftup (or f f') i) = or (shiftup f i) (shiftup f' i)" |
  "(shiftup (box act f) i) = box act (shiftup f i)" |
  "(shiftup (diamond act f) i) = diamond act (shiftup f i)" | 
  "(shiftup (nu f) i) = nu (shiftup f (Suc i))" |
  "(shiftup (mu f) i) = mu (shiftup f (Suc i))"

fun shiftdown :: "'a formula ⇒ nat ⇒ 'a formula "
where 
  "(shiftdown tt i) = tt " |
  "(shiftdown ff i) = ff" |
  "(shiftdown (var X) i)  = (if X ≤ i then var X else var (X - 1))" |
  "(shiftdown (neg f) i) = neg (shiftdown f i)" |
  "(shiftdown (and' f f') i) = and' (shiftdown f i) (shiftdown f' i) " |
  "(shiftdown (or f f') i) = or (shiftdown f i) (shiftdown f' i)" |
  "(shiftdown (diamond act f) i) = diamond act (shiftdown f i) " |
  "(shiftdown (box act f) i) = box act (shiftdown f i)" |
  "(shiftdown (nu f) i) = nu (shiftdown f (Suc i))" |
  "(shiftdown (mu f) i) = mu (shiftdown f (Suc i))"

lemma shiftupanddown : "shiftdown (shiftup f i) i = f"
  by (induct f arbitrary : i; simp)

definition shiftdownenv :: "(nat ⇒ 's set) ⇒ nat ⇒ (nat ⇒ 's set) " where
"shiftdownenv e i n = (if n < i then e n else e (n + 1))"

lemma shiftdownnewenv_eq_newenvshiftdown [simp] : "shiftdownenv (newenvironment e S') (Suc i) = newenvironment (shiftdownenv e i) S'"
  apply (rule)
  apply (induct_tac x)
  apply (simp_all add: shiftdownenv_def)
  done

lemma shiftdownnewenvzero_eq_newenv [simp] : "shiftdownenv (newenvironment e S') 0 = e"
  apply (rule)
  apply (induct_tac x; simp add: shiftdownenv_def)
  done

lemma switchnewenvironmentshiftdown : "⟦shiftdown f (Suc i)⟧ M (newenvironment (shiftdownenv e i) S') = 
  ⟦shiftdown f (Suc i)⟧ M (shiftdownenv (newenvironment e S') (Suc i))"
  by simp

definition envrepeati :: "(nat ⇒ 's set) ⇒ nat ⇒ (nat ⇒ 's set) " where
"envrepeati e i ≡ conc (prefix (Suc i) e) (suffix i e)"

lemma envrepeatidef :  "envrepeati e i = (λj. if j > Suc i then e (j - Suc 0) else (if j ≤ i then e j else e i))"
proof
  fix j
  {
    assume assum1 : "Suc i < j"
    hence "¬j < length (prefix (Suc i) e)" by simp
    hence "conc (prefix (Suc i) e) (suffix i e) j = suffix i e (j - length (prefix (Suc i) e))" using conc_snd by metis
    hence "conc (prefix (Suc i) e) (suffix i e) j = e (j - Suc 0)" using assum1 by simp
  }
  moreover {
    assume "j ≤ i"
    hence "j < length (prefix (Suc i) e)" by auto
    hence "conc (prefix (Suc i) e) (suffix i e) j = e j" using prefix_suffix conc_fst by metis
  }
  moreover {
    assume "¬Suc i < j"
    moreover assume "¬j ≤ i"
    ultimately have "j = Suc i" by auto
    hence "conc (prefix (Suc i) e) (suffix i e) j = e i" by auto
  }
  ultimately show "envrepeati e i j = (if Suc i < j then e (j - Suc 0) else if j ≤ i then e j else e i)" using envrepeati_def by metis
qed

lemma newenvenvrepeatswitch : "newenvironment (envrepeati e i) S' = envrepeati (newenvironment e S') (Suc i)"
  apply (rule)
  apply (induct_tac x; simp add: envrepeatidef)
proof (rule impI)+
  fix n
  assume "Suc i < n"
  hence "n > Suc 0" by auto
  thus "e (n - Suc 0) = newenvironment e S' n" by (induct n; simp)
qed

lemma shiftdownenvrepeat : "⟦shiftdown f i⟧ M e = ⟦f⟧ M (envrepeati e i)"
  apply (induct f arbitrary: e i; simp add: shiftdownenv_def newenvenvrepeatswitch)
  apply (simp add: envrepeatidef)
  apply (intro impI)
  apply (subgoal_tac "x = Suc i"; auto)
  done

lemma shiftdownnewenv : "⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e (e 0)) = ⟦shiftdown f 0⟧ M e "
  apply (subgoal_tac "envrepeati e 0 = newenvironment e (e 0)")
  apply (simp add: shiftdownenvrepeat)
  apply rule
  apply (induct_tac x; simp add: envrepeati_def)
  done

text ‹Defining extensions of the mu calculus, specifically ‹And›, ‹Or›, ‹Diamond›, and ‹Box›.›

fun Andlist :: "'a list ⇒ ('a ⇒ 'a formula) ⇒ 'a formula " where
"Andlist [] F = tt" |
"Andlist (a # as) F = and' (F a) (Andlist as F)"

definition And :: "'a set ⇒ ('a ⇒ 'a formula) ⇒ 'a formula" where
"And A F = Andlist (if finite A then (SOME listA. set listA = A) else undefined) F"

lemma Andlist_eq_all : "⟦Andlist Alist F⟧ M e = {s. ∀a ∈ set Alist. s ∈ ⟦F a⟧ M e}"
  by (induct Alist; simp; auto)

lemma And_eq_all : "finite A ⟹ ⟦And A F⟧ M e = {s. ∀a ∈ A. s ∈ ⟦F a⟧ M e}"
  apply (simp add: And_def Andlist_eq_all)
  apply (rule someI2_ex; simp add: finite_list)
  done

lemma And_eq_all' [simp] : "finite A ⟹ ⟦And A F⟧ M e = (⋂a ∈ A. {s. s ∈ ⟦F a⟧ M e})"
  by (subst And_eq_all; auto)

fun Orlist :: "'a list ⇒ ('a ⇒ 'a formula) ⇒ 'a formula " where
"Orlist [] F = ff" |
"Orlist (a # as) F = or (F a) (Orlist as F)"

definition Or :: "'a set ⇒ ('a ⇒ 'a formula) ⇒ 'a formula" where
"Or A F = Orlist (if finite A then (SOME listA. set listA = A) else undefined) F"

lemma Orlist_eq_exist : "⟦Orlist Alist F⟧ M e = {s. ∃a ∈ set Alist. s ∈ ⟦F a⟧ M e}"
  by (induct Alist; auto)

lemma Or_eq_exist : "finite A ⟹ ⟦Or A F⟧ M e = {s. ∃a ∈ A. s ∈ ⟦F a⟧ M e}"
  apply (simp add: Or_def Orlist_eq_exist)
  apply (rule someI2_ex; simp add: finite_list)
  done

lemma Or_eq_exist' [simp] : "finite A ⟹ ⟦Or A F⟧ M e = (⋃a ∈ A. {s. s ∈ ⟦F a⟧ M e})"
  by (subst Or_eq_exist; auto)

fun Diamond :: "'a rexp ⇒ 'a formula ⇒ 'a formula " where 
"Diamond Zero f = ff" |
"Diamond One f = f" |
"Diamond (Atom a) f = diamond a f" |
"Diamond (Plus R Q) f = or (Diamond R f) (Diamond Q f)" |
"Diamond (Times R Q) f = Diamond R (Diamond Q f)" |
"Diamond (Star R) f =  mu (or (Diamond R (var 0)) (shiftup f 0))" 

lemma Diamondlist_eq_exist [simp] : 
"⟦Diamond (Actslist A) f⟧ M e = {s. ∃ s' act. act ∈ set A ∧ (s, act, s') ∈ (transition M) ∧ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e}"
  by (induct A; auto)

lemma Diamond_eq_exist [simp] : "finite A ⟹
⟦Diamond (Acts A) f⟧ M e = {s. ∃ s' act. act ∈ A ∧ (s, act, s') ∈ (transition M) ∧ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e}"
  apply (simp add: Acts_def)
  apply (rule someI2_ex; simp add: finite_list)
  done

lemma shiftuptwice : "m ≤ i ⟹ shiftup (shiftup f m) (Suc i) = shiftup (shiftup f i) m"
  by (induct f arbitrary : i m; simp)

lemma shiftupDiamond [simp] : "shiftup (Diamond R f) i = Diamond R (shiftup f i)"
  by (induct R arbitrary : i f; simp add: shiftuptwice)

lemma shiftupdown : "m ≤ i ⟹ shiftdown (shiftup f m) (Suc i) = shiftup (shiftdown f i) m"
  by (induct f arbitrary : i m; simp; arith)

lemma shiftdownDiamond [simp] : "shiftdown (Diamond R f) i = Diamond R (shiftdown f i)"
  by (induct R arbitrary : i f; simp add: shiftupdown)

fun Box :: "'a rexp ⇒ 'a formula ⇒ 'a formula " where 
"Box Zero f = tt" |
"Box One f = f" |
"Box (Atom a) f = box a f" |
"Box (Plus R Q) f = and' (Box R f) (Box Q f)" |
"Box (Times R Q) f = Box R (Box Q f)" |
"Box (Star R) f =  nu (and' (Box R (var 0)) (shiftup f 0))" 

lemma Boxlist_eq_forall [simp] : "⟦Box (Actslist A) f⟧ M e = {s. ∀ s' act. act ∈ set A ∧ (s, act, s') ∈ (transition M) ⟶ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e}"
  by (induct A; auto)

lemma Box_eq_forall [simp] : "finite A ⟹
⟦Box (Acts A) f⟧ M e = {s. ∀ s' act. act ∈ A ∧ (s, act, s') ∈ (transition M) ⟶ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e}"
  apply (simp add: Acts_def)
  apply (rule someI2_ex; simp add: finite_list)
  done

lemma shiftupBox [simp] : "shiftup (Box R f) i = Box R (shiftup f i)"
  by (induct R arbitrary : i f; simp add: shiftuptwice)

lemma shiftdownBox [simp] : "shiftdown (Box R f) i = Box R (shiftdown f i)"
  by (induct R arbitrary : i f; simp add: shiftupdown)

text ‹Defining ‹negvar› to prove duality of mu and nu, and also proving how the definition can 
be unfolded on our extensions.›

fun negvar :: "'a formula ⇒ nat ⇒ 'a formula "
where 
  "negvar tt i = tt " |
  "negvar ff i = ff" |
  "negvar (var X) i  = (if i = X then neg (var X) else var X)" |
  "negvar (neg f) i = neg (negvar f i)" |
  "negvar (and' f f') i = and' (negvar f i) (negvar f' i) " |
  "negvar (or f f') i = or (negvar f i) (negvar f' i)" |
  "negvar (box a f) i = box a (negvar f i)" |
  "negvar (diamond a f) i = diamond a (negvar f i) " |
  "negvar (nu f) i = nu (negvar f (Suc i))" |
  "negvar (mu f) i = mu (negvar f (Suc i))"

lemma negvarshiftup : "m ≤ i ⟹ negvar (shiftup f m) (Suc i) = shiftup (negvar f i) m"
  by (induct f arbitrary : m i; simp)

lemma negvarDiamond [simp] : "negvar (Diamond R f) i = Diamond R (negvar f i)"
  by (induct R arbitrary : f i; simp add : negvarshiftup)

lemma negvarBox [simp] : "negvar (Box R f) i = Box R (negvar f i)"
  by (induct R arbitrary : f i; simp add : negvarshiftup)

lemma negvarAndlist [simp] : "negvar (Andlist Alist F) i = Andlist Alist (λa. (negvar (F a) i))"
  by (induct Alist; simp)

lemma negvarAnd [simp] : "finite A ⟹ negvar (And A F) i = And A (λa. (negvar (F a) i))"
  by (simp add: And_def)

lemma negvarOrlist [simp] : "negvar (Orlist Alist F) i = Orlist Alist (λa. (negvar (F a) i))"
  by (induct Alist; simp)

lemma negvarOr [simp] : "finite A ⟹ negvar (Or A F) i = Or A (λa. (negvar (F a) i))"
  by (simp add: Or_def)

value "negvar (or (var 0) (mu (and' (var 0) (var 1)))) 0 :: nat formula"

section ‹Proving duality of formulas.›

lemma negtrue [simp] : "⟦neg tt⟧ M e = ⟦ff⟧ M e"
  by simp

lemma negfalse [simp]: "⟦neg ff⟧ M e = ⟦tt⟧ M e"
  by simp

lemma negnegf [simp] : "⟦neg (neg (f))⟧ M e = ⟦f⟧ M e"
  by simp

lemma negand' [simp] : "⟦neg (and' f f')⟧ M e = ⟦or (neg f) (neg f')⟧ M e"
  by simp

lemma negAnd [simp] : "finite A ⟹ ⟦neg (And A F)⟧ M e = ⟦Or A (λa. neg (F a))⟧ M e"
  by auto

lemma negor [simp] : "⟦neg (or f f')⟧ M e = ⟦and' (neg f) (neg f')⟧ M e"
  by simp

lemma negOr [simp] : "finite A ⟹ ⟦neg (Or A F)⟧ M e = ⟦And A (λa. neg (F a))⟧ M e"
  by auto

lemma negbox : "⟦neg (box act f)⟧ M e = ⟦diamond act (neg f)⟧ M e"
  by auto

lemma negdiamond : "⟦neg (diamond act f)⟧ M e = ⟦box act (neg f)⟧ M e"
  by auto

lemma movenegvarin : "⟦f⟧ M (e(i := -e(i))) = ⟦negvar f i⟧ M e"
  apply (induct f arbitrary : e i; simp; subgoal_tac "⋀S'. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') (Suc i := - e i) = ⟦negvar f (Suc i)⟧ M (newenvironment e S')")
  apply simp_all
proof-
  fix f e i S'
  assume "⋀e i. ⟦f⟧ M e(i := - e i) = ⟦negvar f i⟧ M e"
  hence "⟦f⟧ M ((newenvironment e S') (Suc i := - (newenvironment e S' (Suc i)))) = ⟦negvar f (Suc i)⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" by metis
  moreover have "⟦f⟧ M ((newenvironment e S') (Suc i := - (newenvironment e S' (Suc i)))) = ⟦f⟧ M ((newenvironment e S') (Suc i := - e i))" by simp
  ultimately show "⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') (Suc i := - e i) = ⟦negvar f (Suc i)⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" by simp
  thus " ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') (Suc i := - e i) = ⟦negvar f (Suc i)⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" by simp
qed

lemma negnu : "⟦neg (nu f)⟧ M e = ⟦mu (neg (negvar f 0))⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "⋀ S'. ⟦neg f⟧ M (newenvironment e (-S')) = ⟦negvar (neg f) 0⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" using movenegvarin newenvironmentzerocomplement by metis  
  hence "⋂ {S'. S' ⊇ ⟦neg f⟧ M (newenvironment e (-S'))} = ⋂ {S'. S' ⊇ ⟦neg (negvar f 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e S')}" by auto
  moreover have "⟦neg (nu f)⟧ M e = (⋂ {S'. S' ⊇ ⟦neg f⟧ M (newenvironment e (-S'))})" by (auto simp: negcupcap)
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed  

lemma negvarnegvar [simp] : "⟦negvar (negvar f i) i⟧ M e = ⟦f⟧ M e"
  (*by (metis (mono_tags, opaque_lifting)
      boolean_algebra_class.boolean_algebra.double_compl fun_upd_def fun_upd_triv
      fun_upd_upd movenegvarin)*)
  by (induct f arbitrary : i e; simp)

lemma negmu : "⟦neg (mu f)⟧ M e = ⟦nu (neg (negvar f 0))⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "⟦mu (neg (negvar (neg (negvar f 0)) 0))⟧ M e = ⟦neg (nu (neg (negvar f 0)))⟧ M e" by (simp only: negnu)
  hence "⟦neg (mu (neg (negvar (neg (negvar f 0)) 0)))⟧ M e = ⟦neg (neg (nu (neg (negvar f 0))))⟧ M e" by auto
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

text ‹Defining the occurrence and dependence of variables.›

fun occursvar :: "'a formula ⇒ nat ⇒ bool "
where 
  "(occursvar tt i) = False " |
  "(occursvar ff i) = False" |
  "(occursvar (var X) i) = (i = X)" |
  "(occursvar (neg f) i) = (occursvar f i)" |
  "(occursvar (and' f f') i) = ((occursvar f i) ∨ (occursvar f' i))" |
  "(occursvar (or f f') i) = ((occursvar f i) ∨ (occursvar f' i))" |
  "(occursvar (diamond act f) i) = (occursvar f i) " |
  "(occursvar (box act f) i) = (occursvar f i)" |
  "(occursvar (nu f) i) = (occursvar f (Suc i))" |
  "(occursvar (mu f) i) = (occursvar f (Suc i))"

lemma shiftdown_shiftdownenv [simp] : "¬ occursvar f i ⟶ ⟦shiftdown f i⟧ M (shiftdownenv e i) = ⟦f⟧ M e"
  apply (induct f arbitrary: e i; simp add: shiftdownenv_def; (arith|rule impI); subst switchnewenvironmentshiftdown)
proof-
  fix f e i
  assume assum1 : "(⋀e i. ¬ occursvar f i ⟶ (⟦shiftdown f i⟧ M (shiftdownenv e i)) = (⟦f⟧ M e))"
  assume assum2 : "¬ occursvar f (Suc i)"
  hence "∀S'. ⟦shiftdown f (Suc i)⟧ M (shiftdownenv (newenvironment e S') (Suc i)) = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" using assum1 by blast
  thus "⋂ {S'. ⟦shiftdown f (Suc i)⟧ M (shiftdownenv (newenvironment e S') (Suc i)) ⊆ S'} = ⋂ {S'. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') ⊆ S'}" by auto
next
  fix f e i
  assume assum1 : "(⋀e i. ¬ occursvar f i ⟶ (⟦shiftdown f i⟧ M (shiftdownenv e i)) = (⟦f⟧ M e))"
  assume assum2 : "¬ occursvar f (Suc i)"
  hence "∀S'. ⟦shiftdown f (Suc i)⟧ M (shiftdownenv (newenvironment e S') (Suc i)) = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" using assum1 by blast
  thus "⋃ {S'. S' ⊆ ⟦shiftdown f (Suc i)⟧ M (shiftdownenv (newenvironment e S') (Suc i))} = ⋃ {S'. S' ⊆ ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')}" by auto
qed

lemma closedformula : "((∀i ≥ j. ¬occursvar f i) ∧ (∀i < j. e i = e' i)) ⟹ ⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦f⟧ M e'"
  apply (induct f arbitrary: e e' j; simp)
  using linorder_le_less_linear apply blast
  apply blast
  apply blast
  apply (subgoal_tac "⋀S'. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e' S')")
  apply simp
  prefer 2 
  apply (subgoal_tac "⋀S'. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e' S')")
  apply simp
proof-
  fix f j S'
  fix e e' :: "nat ⇒ 'b set"
  assume "(⋀e e' j. (∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f i) ∧ (∀i<j. e i = e' i) ⟹ ⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦f⟧ M e')"
  moreover {
    assume "∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f (Suc i)"
    hence "∀i ≥ Suc j. ¬ occursvar f i" using Suc_le_D by auto 
  }
  moreover {
    assume assum1 : "∀i<j. e i = e' i"
    have "∀i<Suc j. newenvironment e S' i = newenvironment e' S' i" 
      by (rule; induct_tac i; simp add: assum1)
  }
  moreover assume "(∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f (Suc i)) ∧ (∀i<j. e i = e' i)"
  ultimately show "⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e' S')" by auto
  thus "⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e' S')" by simp
qed

lemma closedformulacoro : "(⋀i. ¬occursvar f i) ⟹ ⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦f⟧ M e'"
  using closedformula less_nat_zero_code by metis

lemma shiftupnotoccurs [simp] : "¬(occursvar (shiftup f i) i)"
  by (induct f arbitrary : i; simp)

lemma shiftuplemma [simp] : "⟦shiftup f 0⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦f⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "⟦shiftdown (shiftup f 0) 0⟧ M (shiftdownenv (newenvironment e S') 0) = ⟦shiftup f 0⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" using shiftupnotoccurs shiftdown_shiftdownenv by metis
  thus "⟦shiftup f 0⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦f⟧ M e" using shiftupanddown shiftdownnewenvzero_eq_newenv by metis
qed

lemma DiamondPlus : 
  assumes "⋀f g. ⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦g⟧ M e ⟹ ⟦Diamond R f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond R g⟧ M e"
  and "⋀f g. ⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦g⟧ M e ⟹ ⟦Diamond Q f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond Q g⟧ M e"
  and "⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦g⟧ M e" 
  shows "⟦Diamond (Plus R Q) f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond (Plus R Q) g⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "⟦Diamond R f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond R g⟧ M e ∧ ⟦Diamond Q f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond Q g⟧ M e" using assms by blast
  thus "⟦Diamond (Plus R Q) f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond (Plus R Q) g⟧ M e" by simp
qed

lemma DiamondTimes : 
  assumes "⋀f g. ⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦g⟧ M e ⟹ ⟦Diamond R f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond R g⟧ M e"
  and "⋀f g. ⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦g⟧ M e ⟹ ⟦Diamond Q f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond Q g⟧ M e"
  and "⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦g⟧ M e" 
  shows "⟦Diamond (Times R Q) f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond (Times R Q) g⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "⟦Diamond R (Diamond Q f)⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond R (Diamond Q g)⟧ M e" using assms by blast
  thus "⟦Diamond (Times R Q) f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond (Times R Q) g⟧ M e" by simp
qed

lemma Diamond_eq : "⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦g⟧ M e ⟹ ⟦Diamond R f⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond R g⟧ M e"
  by (induct R arbitrary: f g; (((rule DiamondPlus|rule DiamondTimes); blast)|simp))

lemma occursvarshiftup : "m ≤ i ⟹ occursvar (shiftup f m) (Suc i) = occursvar f i"
  by (induct f arbitrary : i m; simp)

lemma occursDiamond [simp] : "(occursvar (Diamond R f) i) = (occursvar f i ∧ ¬rexp_empty R)"
  by (induct R arbitrary : f i; simp add : occursvarshiftup; auto)

lemma occursBox [simp] : "(occursvar (Box R f) i) = (occursvar f i ∧ ¬rexp_empty R)"
  by (induct R arbitrary : f i; simp add : occursvarshiftup; auto)

lemma negBox : "⟦neg (Box R f)⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond R (neg f)⟧ M e"
  apply (induct R arbitrary: f e; simp)
  apply blast
proof-
  fix R Q f e
  assume "⋀f e. -(⟦Box Q f⟧ M e) =  ⟦Diamond Q (neg f)⟧ M e"
  hence "⟦neg (Box Q f)⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond Q (neg f)⟧ M e" by simp
  thus "⟦Diamond R (neg (Box Q f))⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond R (Diamond Q (neg f))⟧ M e" using Diamond_eq by blast
next
  fix R f e
  assume "⋀f e. - (⟦Box R f⟧ M e) = ⟦Diamond R (neg f)⟧ M e" 
  hence "⋀S'. -(⟦Box R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e (-S'))) = ⟦Diamond R (neg (var 0))⟧ M (newenvironment e (-S'))" by blast
  moreover have "⋀S'. ⟦Diamond R (neg (var 0))⟧ M (newenvironment e (-S')) = ⟦negvar (Diamond R (neg (var 0))) 0⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" using movenegvarin newenvironmentzerocomplement by metis
  ultimately have "⋀S'. -(⟦Box R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e (-S'))) = ⟦Diamond R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" by (simp add: Diamond_eq)
  moreover have "- ⋃ {S'. S' ⊆ ⟦Box R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e S') ∧ S' ⊆ ⟦f⟧ M e} = ⋂ {S'. -S' ⊆ ⟦Box R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e (-S')) ∧ -S' ⊆ ⟦f⟧ M e}" by (rule negcupcap)
  moreover have "... =  ⋂ {S'. -(⟦Box R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e (-S'))) ⊆ S' ∧ - (⟦f⟧ M e) ⊆ S'}" using compl_le_swap2 by meson
  ultimately show "- ⋃ {S'. S' ⊆ ⟦Box R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e S') ∧ S' ⊆ ⟦f⟧ M e} = ⋂ {S'. ⟦Diamond R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e S') ⊆ S' ∧ - (⟦f⟧ M e) ⊆ S'}" by auto
qed

lemma negDiamond : "⟦neg (Diamond R f)⟧ M e = ⟦Box R (neg f)⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "⟦Diamond R f⟧ M e = ⟦neg (Box R (neg f))⟧ M e" using Diamond_eq negBox negnegf by metis
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma Box_eq : "⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦g⟧ M e ⟹ ⟦Box R f⟧ M e = ⟦Box R g⟧ M e"
proof-
  assume "⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦g⟧ M e"
  hence "⟦neg f⟧ M e = ⟦neg g⟧ M e" by simp
  hence "⟦Diamond R (neg f)⟧ M e = ⟦Diamond R (neg g)⟧ M e" by (rule Diamond_eq)
  hence "⟦neg (Box R f)⟧ M e = ⟦neg (Box R g)⟧ M e" by (simp only: negBox)
  thus "⟦Box R f⟧ M e = ⟦Box R g⟧ M e" by simp
qed

definition transformer :: "'a formula ⇒ ('a, 's) lts ⇒ (nat ⇒ 's set) ⇒ 's set ⇒ 's set "
  where
"transformer f M e S' = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')"

lemma transformerdef : "transformer f M e = (λS'. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S'))"
  by (rule; simp add: transformer_def)

definition dependvar :: "'a formula ⇒ ('a, 's) lts ⇒ nat ⇒ bool" where
"dependvar f M i = (∃e S'. ⟦f⟧ M e ≠ ⟦f⟧ M (e(i := S')))"

lemma notdependshiftdown : "¬dependvar f M 0 ⟹ ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦shiftdown f 0⟧ M e"
proof- 
  assume "¬dependvar f M 0"
  hence "⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e (e 0)) = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e (e 0))(0 := S')" using dependvar_def by metis
  moreover have "⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e (e 0)) = ⟦shiftdown f 0⟧ M e" using shiftdownnewenv by metis
  moreover have "(newenvironment e (e 0))(0 := S') = newenvironment e S'" by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by (simp add: shiftdownenvrepeat)
qed

lemma dependvarX : "dependvar (var X) M i = (X = i)"
  by (auto simp: dependvar_def)

lemma dependvarneg : "dependvar (neg f) M i = dependvar f M i"
  by (simp add: dependvar_def)

lemma dependvarandor : "¬dependvar f1 M i ∧ ¬dependvar f2 M i ⟹ ¬dependvar (and' f1 f2) M i ∧ ¬dependvar (or f1 f2) M i"
  by (simp add: dependvar_def)

lemma dependvarboxdiamond : "¬dependvar f M i  ⟹ ¬dependvar (box a f) M i ∧ ¬dependvar (diamond a f) M i"
  by (simp add: dependvar_def)

lemma dependvarnumu : "¬dependvar f M (Suc i)  ⟹ ¬dependvar (nu f) M i ∧ ¬dependvar (mu f) M i"
  by (simp add: dependvar_def)

lemma shiftup_envrepeati [simp] : "⟦shiftup f m⟧ M (envrepeati e m) = ⟦f⟧ M e"
  using shiftdownenvrepeat shiftupanddown by metis

lemma notoccursnotdepends : "¬occursvar f i ⟹ ¬dependvar f M i"
  apply (induct f arbitrary: i; simp add: dependvarneg dependvarandor dependvarboxdiamond dependvarnumu)
  apply (simp_all add: dependvar_def)
  done

lemma dependsoccurs : "dependvar f M i ⟹ occursvar f i"
  using notoccursnotdepends by auto

lemma dependvarshiftup [simp] : "m ≤ i ⟹ dependvar (shiftup f m) M (Suc i) = dependvar f M i" 
  apply (simp add: dependvar_def)
proof
  assume "∃e S'. ⟦shiftup f m⟧ M e ≠ ⟦shiftup f m⟧ M e(Suc i := S')"
  then obtain e S' where "⟦shiftup f m⟧ M e ≠ ⟦shiftup f m⟧ M e(Suc i := S')" by auto
  hence "⟦shiftdown (shiftup f m) m⟧ M (shiftdownenv e m) ≠ ⟦shiftdown (shiftup f m) m⟧ M (shiftdownenv (e(Suc i := S')) m)" by simp
  moreover assume "m ≤ i"
  moreover have "m ≤ i ⟹ (shiftdownenv (e(Suc i := S')) m) = (shiftdownenv e m)(i := S')" by (rule; simp add: shiftdownenv_def)
  ultimately have "⟦f⟧ M (shiftdownenv e m) ≠ ⟦f⟧ M (shiftdownenv e m)(i := S')" by (simp add: shiftupanddown)
  thus "∃e S'. ⟦f⟧ M e ≠ ⟦f⟧ M e(i := S')" by auto
next
  assume "∃e S'. ⟦f⟧ M e ≠ ⟦f⟧ M e(i := S')"
  then obtain e S' where "⟦f⟧ M e ≠ ⟦f⟧ M e(i := S')" by auto
  moreover have "¬dependvar (shiftup f m) M m" using shiftupnotoccurs notoccursnotdepends by blast
  ultimately have "⟦shiftup f m⟧ M (envrepeati e m) ≠ ⟦shiftup f m⟧ M (envrepeati (e(i := S')) m) (m := e m)" by (simp add: dependvar_def)
  moreover assume "m ≤ i"
  moreover have "m ≤ i ⟹((envrepeati (e(i := S')) m) (m := e m)) = (envrepeati e m) (Suc i := S')" by (rule; simp add: envrepeatidef; arith)
  ultimately have "⟦shiftup f m⟧ M (envrepeati e m) ≠ ⟦shiftup f m⟧ M (envrepeati e m)(Suc i := S')" by simp
  thus "∃e S'. ⟦shiftup f m⟧ M e ≠ ⟦shiftup f m⟧ M e(Suc i := S')" by auto
qed

lemma dependvarBoxDiamond : "¬dependvar f M i  ⟹ ¬dependvar (Box R f) M i ∧ ¬dependvar (Diamond R f) M i"
  by (induct R arbitrary: f i; simp add: dependvarX dependvarandor dependvarnumu; simp add: dependvar_def)

lemma concsubst : "length e = Suc i ⟹ (conc (take i e) (S' ## env)) (i := e!i) = conc e env"
proof
  fix j
  assume assum1: "length e = Suc i"
  have "j < i ∨ j = i ∨ j ≥ Suc i" by auto
  moreover {
    assume "j < i"
    hence "((conc (take i e) (S' ## env)) (i := e ! i)) j = (conc e env) j" using assum1 by auto
  }
  moreover {
    assume "j = i"
    hence "((conc (take i e) (S' ## env)) (i := e ! i)) j = (conc e env) j" using assum1 by auto
  }
  moreover {
    assume "j ≥ Suc i"
    hence "j - i = Suc (j - Suc i)" by auto
    hence "((conc (take i e) (S' ## env)) (i := e ! i)) j = (conc e env) j" using assum1 by auto
  }
  ultimately show "((conc (take i e) (S' ## env)) (i := e ! i)) j = (conc e env) j" by auto
qed

lemma notdependfirstpart : "(∀i < j. ¬dependvar f M i) ∧ (length e = length e' ∧ length e ≤ j)
    ⟹ ⟦f⟧ M (conc e env) = ⟦f⟧ M (conc e' env)"
  apply (induct j arbitrary: e e' env)
  apply auto[1]
proof-
  fix j env
  fix e e' :: "'b set list"
  assume assum1 : "(⋀e e' env. (∀i<j. ¬ dependvar f M i) ∧ length e = length e' ∧ length e ≤ j ⟹ ⟦f⟧ M (conc e env) = ⟦f⟧ M (conc e' env))"
  assume assum2 : "(∀i<Suc j. ¬ dependvar f M i) ∧ length e = length e' ∧ length e ≤ Suc j"
  hence " length e = Suc j ∨ length e ≤ j" by auto
  moreover {
    have "⟦f⟧ M (conc (take j e) (env 0 ## env)) = ⟦f⟧ M (conc (take j e') (env 0 ## env))" by (simp add: assum1 assum2)
    hence "⟦f⟧ M ((conc (take j e) (env 0 ## env)) (j := e!j)) = ⟦f⟧ M ((conc (take j e') (env 0 ## env)) (j := e'!j))" using assum2 by (simp add: dependvar_def)
    moreover assume "length e = Suc j"
    ultimately have "⟦f⟧ M (conc e env) = ⟦f⟧ M (conc e' env)" using concsubst assum2 by metis 
  }
  moreover {
    assume "length e ≤ j"
    moreover have "(∀i<j. ¬ dependvar f M i) ∧ length e = length e'" using assum2 by auto
    ultimately have "⟦f⟧ M (conc e env) = ⟦f⟧ M (conc e' env)" using assum1 by metis
  }
  ultimately show "⟦f⟧ M (conc e env) = ⟦f⟧ M (conc e' env)" by auto
qed

lemma existsmaxoccurs : "∃j. ∀i ≥ j. ¬occursvar f i"
  apply (induct f; simp)
  using Suc_n_not_le_n apply blast
proof-
  fix f1 f2 :: "'a formula"
  assume "∃j. ∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f1 i"
  moreover assume "∃j. ∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f2 i"
  ultimately obtain j j' where "(∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f1 i) ∧ (∀i≥j'. ¬ occursvar f2 i)" by auto
  hence "∀i≥(max j j'). ¬ occursvar f1 i ∧  ¬ occursvar f2 i" by simp
  thus "∃j. ∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f1 i ∧  ¬ occursvar f2 i" by blast
  thus "∃j. ∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f1 i ∧  ¬ occursvar f2 i" by simp
next
  fix f :: "'a formula"
  assume "∃j. ∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f i"
  then obtain j where "∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f i" by auto
  hence "∀i≥Suc j. ¬ occursvar f (Suc i)" by simp
  thus "∃j. ∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f (Suc i)" by blast
  thus "∃j. ∀i≥j. ¬ occursvar f (Suc i)" by simp
qed

lemma notdependlastpart : "(∀i≥length elist. ¬occursvar f i) ⟶ ⟦f⟧ M (conc elist e) = ⟦f⟧ M (conc elist e')"
  apply (induct f arbitrary : e e' elist; simp; rule impI)
  apply (subgoal_tac "x < length elist")
  apply simp
  apply arith
  apply blast
  apply blast
  apply blast
  apply blast
proof-
  fix f e e' 
  fix elist :: "'a set list"
  assume assum1: "(⋀e e' elist. (∀i≥length elist. ¬ occursvar f i) ⟶ ⟦f⟧ M (elist ⌢ e) = ⟦f⟧ M (elist ⌢ e'))"
  assume "∀i≥length elist. ¬ occursvar f (Suc i)"
  hence "∀i ≥ Suc (length elist). ¬ occursvar f i" using Suc_le_D by auto
  moreover have "⋀S'. length (S' # elist) = Suc (length elist)" by simp
  ultimately have conclusion : "⋀S'. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment (conc elist e) S') = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment (conc elist e') S')" using assum1 build_cons by metis
  thus "⋃ {S'. S' ⊆ ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment (conc elist e) S')} = ⋃ {S'. S' ⊆ ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment (conc elist e') S')}" by auto
  thus "⋂ {S'. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment (conc elist e) S') ⊆ S'} = ⋂ {S'. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment (conc elist e') S') ⊆ S'}" using conclusion by auto
qed

text ‹If a formula does not depend on any variable, we can change its environment without changing
its semantics.›

lemma notdependchangeenv : "(⋀i. ¬dependvar f M i) ⟹ ⟦f⟧ M e = ⟦f⟧ M e'"
proof-
  obtain j where assum1:"∀i ≥ j. ¬occursvar f i" using existsmaxoccurs by auto
  assume "⋀i. ¬dependvar f M i"
  hence "∀i<j. ¬dependvar f M i" by auto
  moreover have "length (prefix j e) = length (prefix j e') ∧ length (prefix j e) ≤ j" by auto
  ultimately have res1: "⟦f⟧ M (conc (prefix j e) (suffix j e)) = ⟦f⟧ M (conc (prefix j e') (suffix j e))" using notdependfirstpart by metis
  have "length (prefix j e') = j" by auto
  hence res2: "⟦f⟧ M (conc (prefix j e') (suffix j e)) = ⟦f⟧ M (conc (prefix j e') (suffix j e'))" using assum1 notdependlastpart by metis
  show ?thesis using res1 res2 by auto
qed

lemma notdependseqnu :
  assumes "¬ dependvar f M 0"
  shows "⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦nu f⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "∀S''. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦f⟧ M ((newenvironment e S') (0 := S''))" using assms dependvar_def by blast
  hence "∀S''. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S'') = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" by auto
  hence "⋃ {S''. S'' ⊆ ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S'')} = ⋃ {S''. S'' ⊆ ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')}" by blast
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma notdependseqmu :
  assumes "¬ dependvar f M 0"
  shows "⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦mu f⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "∀S''. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') = ⟦f⟧ M ((newenvironment e S') (0 := S''))" using assms dependvar_def by blast
  hence "∀S''. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S'') = ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" by auto
  hence "⋂ {S''. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S'') ⊆ S''} = ⋂ {S''. ⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S') ⊆ S''}" by blast
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma notdependsmono : "¬dependvar f M i ⟹
  mono (λS.(⟦f⟧ M (e(i := S)))) ∧ antimono (λS.(⟦f⟧ M (e(i := S))))"
  by (induct f arbitrary: i; simp add: dependvar_def monotone_def)

lemma notdependscoro : "(¬dependvar f M 0 ⟶ mono (transformer f M e))"
proof-
  have "∀S''. ¬dependvar f M 0 ⟶ mono (λS'.(⟦f⟧ M ((newenvironment e S'')(0 := S'))))" using notdependsmono by metis
  hence "¬dependvar f M 0 ⟶ mono (λS'.(⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')))" by auto
  thus ?thesis by (simp add: transformerdef)
qed

lemma andsubset : 
  assumes "A⇩1 ⊆ B⇩1 ∧ A⇩2 ⊆ B⇩2"
  shows "A⇩1 ∩ A⇩2 ⊆ B⇩1 ∧ A⇩1 ∩ A⇩2 ⊆ B⇩2"
  using assms by auto

lemma orsubset : 
  assumes "A⇩1 ⊆ B⇩1 ∨ A⇩2 ⊆ B⇩2"
  shows "A⇩1 ⊆ B⇩1 ∪ B⇩2 ∨ A⇩2 ⊆ B⇩1 ∪ B⇩2"
  using assms by auto

text ‹Defining function ‹notdependalloccursposnegi› that can be evaluated on formulas and
proving that this evaluation can imply monotonicity (or antimonotonicity).›

fun notdependalloccursposnegi :: "'a formula ⇒ ('a ,'s) lts ⇒ nat ⇒ bool ⇒ bool"
where 
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi tt M i b) = True " |
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi ff M i b) = True" |
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi (var X) M i b) = ((X ≠ i) ∨ b)" |
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi (neg f) M i b) = (¬dependvar f M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i (¬b))" |
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi (and' f f') M i b) = (¬dependvar (and' f f') M i ∨ (notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f' M i b))" |
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi (or f f') M i b) = (¬dependvar (or f f') M i ∨ (notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f' M i b))" |
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi (box act f) M i b) = (¬dependvar (box act f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b)" |
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi (diamond act f) M i b) = (¬dependvar (diamond act f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b) " |  
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi (nu f) M i b) = (¬dependvar (nu f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) b)" |
  "(notdependalloccursposnegi (mu f) M i b) = (¬dependvar (mu f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) b)"

lemma notdepends : "¬dependvar f M i ⟹ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b"
  apply (induct f arbitrary : i b; simp add: dependvar_def)
  apply (rule impI)
  apply auto
  done

lemma notdependalloccursposnegi_shiftup : "m ≤ i ⟹ notdependalloccursposnegi (shiftup f m) M (Suc i) b = notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b"
  apply (induct f arbitrary: b m i; simp)
  apply (metis dependvarshiftup shiftup.simps(5))
  apply (metis dependvarshiftup shiftup.simps(6))
  apply (metis dependvarshiftup shiftup.simps(7))
  apply (metis dependvarshiftup shiftup.simps(8))
  apply (metis dependvarshiftup shiftup.simps(9))
  apply (metis dependvarshiftup shiftup.simps(10))
  done

lemma notdependalloccursposnegi_Diamond [simp] : "notdependalloccursposnegi (Diamond R f) M i b = (¬dependvar (Diamond R f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b)"
  apply (induct R arbitrary: f i b)
  apply (simp add: dependvar_def)
  using notdepends apply auto[1]
  apply (simp add: dependvar_def)
  using dependvarandor apply fastforce
  apply simp
  using dependvarBoxDiamond apply fastforce
proof-
  fix R f i b
  assume IH : "⋀f i b. notdependalloccursposnegi (Diamond R f) M i b = (¬ dependvar (Diamond R f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b)"
  have "notdependalloccursposnegi (Diamond (Star R) f) M i b = (¬ dependvar (Diamond (Star R) f) M i ∨ ¬ dependvar (or (Diamond R (var 0)) (shiftup f 0)) M (Suc i) ∨ (notdependalloccursposnegi (Diamond R (var 0)) M (Suc i) b ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi (shiftup f 0) M (Suc i) b))" by simp
  hence "notdependalloccursposnegi (Diamond (Star R) f) M i b = (¬ dependvar (Diamond (Star R) f) M i ∨ ¬ dependvar (shiftup f 0) M (Suc i) ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi (shiftup f 0) M (Suc i) b)"
    using  Diamond.simps(6) IH dependvarX dependvarnumu nat.distinct(1) notdepends by metis
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi (shiftup f 0) M (Suc i) b = notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b" using notdependalloccursposnegi_shiftup by blast
  ultimately show "notdependalloccursposnegi (Diamond (Star R) f) M i b = (¬ dependvar (Diamond (Star R) f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b)" using notdepends by auto
qed

lemma notdependalloccursposnegi_Box [simp] : "notdependalloccursposnegi (Box R f) M i b = (¬dependvar (Box R f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b)"
  apply (induct R arbitrary: f i b)
  apply (simp add: dependvar_def)
  using notdepends apply auto[1]
  apply (simp add: dependvar_def)
  using dependvarandor apply fastforce
  apply simp
  using dependvarBoxDiamond apply fastforce
proof-
  fix R f i b
  assume IH : "⋀f i b. notdependalloccursposnegi (Box R f) M i b = (¬ dependvar (Box R f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b)"
  have "notdependalloccursposnegi (Box (Star R) f) M i b = (¬ dependvar (Box (Star R) f) M i ∨ ¬ dependvar (and' (Box R (var 0)) (shiftup f 0)) M (Suc i) ∨ (notdependalloccursposnegi (Box R (var 0)) M (Suc i) b ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi (shiftup f 0) M (Suc i) b))" by simp
  hence "notdependalloccursposnegi (Box (Star R) f) M i b = (¬ dependvar (Box (Star R) f) M i ∨ ¬ dependvar (shiftup f 0) M (Suc i) ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi (shiftup f 0) M (Suc i) b)"
    using Box.simps(6) IH dependvarX dependvarnumu nat.distinct(1) notdepends by metis
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi (shiftup f 0) M (Suc i) b = notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b" using notdependalloccursposnegi_shiftup by blast
  ultimately show "notdependalloccursposnegi (Box (Star R) f) M i b = (¬ dependvar (Box (Star R) f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i b)" using notdepends by auto
qed

lemma andormonoantimono : 
  shows "mono f1 ∧ mono f2 ⟹ mono (λS'. f1 S' ∩ f2 S') ∧  mono (λS'. f1 S' ∪ f2 S')"
  and "antimono f1 ∧ antimono f2 ⟹ antimono (λS'. f1 S' ∩ f2 S') ∧ antimono (λS'. f1 S' ∪ f2 S')"
  apply (simp_all add: monotone_def andsubset orsubset)
  apply blast+
  done

lemma boxdiamondmonoantimono : 
  shows "mono f ⟹ mono (λS'. {s. ∀ s'. (s, a, s') ∈ (transition M) ⟶  s' ∈ f S'}) ∧ mono (λS'. {s. ∃ s'. (s, a, s') ∈ (transition M) ∧  s' ∈ f S'})"
  and "antimono f ⟹ antimono (λS'. {s. ∀ s'. (s, a, s') ∈ (transition M) ⟶  s' ∈ f S'}) ∧ antimono (λS'. {s. ∃ s'. (s, a, s') ∈ (transition M) ∧  s' ∈ f S'})"
  apply (simp_all add: monotone_def)
  using monoD apply blast+
  done

lemma numumono : 
  assumes "⋀S''. mono (f S'')"
  shows "mono (λS'. (⋃ {S''. S'' ⊆ f S'' S'}))"
  and "mono (λS'. (⋂ {S''. S'' ⊇ f S'' S'}))"
  apply (simp_all add: monotone_def)
  apply (rule allI impI)+
  apply (subgoal_tac "∀S''. S'' ⊆ f S'' x ⟶ S'' ⊆ f S'' y")
  apply (simp add: Collect_mono_iff Sup_subset_mono)
  using assms monotoneD apply fastforce
  apply (rule allI impI)+
  apply (subgoal_tac "∀S''. f S'' y ⊆ S'' ⟶ f S'' x ⊆ S''")
  apply (simp add: Collect_mono_iff Inf_superset_mono)
  using assms monotoneD apply fastforce
  done

lemma numuantimono : 
  assumes "⋀S''. antimono (f S'')"
  shows "antimono (λS'. (⋃ {S''. S'' ⊆ f S'' S'}))"
  and "antimono (λS'. (⋂ {S''. S'' ⊇ f S'' S'}))"
  apply (simp_all add: monotone_def)
  apply (rule allI impI)+
  apply (subgoal_tac "∀S''. S'' ⊆ f S'' y ⟶ S'' ⊆ f S'' x")
  apply (simp add: Collect_mono_iff Sup_subset_mono)
  using assms monotoneD apply fastforce
  apply (rule allI impI)+
  apply (subgoal_tac "∀S''. f S'' x ⊆ S'' ⟶ f S'' y ⊆ S''")
  apply (simp add: Collect_mono_iff Inf_superset_mono)
  using assms monotoneD apply fastforce
  done

lemma monotonicitynotdepend :
"(notdependalloccursposnegi f M i True ⟶ mono (λS'.(⟦f⟧ M (e(i := S')))))
 ∧ (notdependalloccursposnegi f M i False ⟶ antimono (λS'.(⟦f⟧ M (e(i := S')))))"
  apply (induct f arbitrary : i e; simp only: notdependalloccursposnegi.simps)
  apply (simp add: monotone_def)+
  apply (metis notdepends)
proof-
  fix f1 f2 i e
  assume assum1: "(⋀i e. (notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦f1⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦f1⟧ M e(i := S'))))"
  assume assum2: "(⋀i e. (notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦f2⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦f2⟧ M e(i := S'))))"
  have "¬ dependvar (and' f1 f2) M i ⟶ (mono (λS'. ⟦and' f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S')) ∧ antimono (λS'. ⟦and' f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S')))" using notdependsmono by metis
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i True ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i True ⟹ mono (λS'. ⟦and' f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 assum2 andormonoantimono)
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i False ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i False ⟹ antimono (λS'. ⟦and' f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 assum2 andormonoantimono)
  ultimately show "(¬ dependvar (and' f1 f2) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i True ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦and' f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (¬ dependvar (and' f1 f2) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i False ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦and' f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S')))" by auto
  have "¬ dependvar (or f1 f2) M i ⟶ (mono (λS'. ⟦or f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S')) ∧ antimono (λS'. ⟦or f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S')))" using notdependsmono by metis
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i True ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i True ⟹ mono (λS'. ⟦or f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 assum2 andormonoantimono)
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i False ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i False ⟹ antimono (λS'. ⟦or f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 assum2 andormonoantimono)
  ultimately show "(¬ dependvar (or f1 f2) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i True ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦or f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (¬ dependvar (or f1 f2) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f1 M i False ∧ notdependalloccursposnegi f2 M i False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦or f1 f2⟧ M e(i := S')))" by auto
next
  fix a f i e
  assume assum1: "(⋀i e. (notdependalloccursposnegi f M i True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦f⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (notdependalloccursposnegi f M i False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦f⟧ M e(i := S'))))"
  have "¬ dependvar (box a f) M i ⟶ (mono (λS'. ⟦box a f⟧ M e(i := S')) ∧ antimono (λS'. ⟦box a f⟧ M e(i := S')))" using notdependsmono by metis
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f M i True ⟹ mono (λS'. ⟦box a f⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 boxdiamondmonoantimono)
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f M i False ⟹ antimono (λS'. ⟦box a f⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 boxdiamondmonoantimono)
  ultimately show "(¬ dependvar (box a f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦box a f⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (¬ dependvar (box a f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦box a f⟧ M e(i := S')))" by auto
  have "¬ dependvar (diamond a f) M i ⟶ (mono (λS'. ⟦diamond a f⟧ M e(i := S')) ∧ antimono (λS'. ⟦diamond a f⟧ M e(i := S')))" using notdependsmono by metis
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f M i True ⟹ mono (λS'. ⟦diamond a f⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 boxdiamondmonoantimono)
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f M i False ⟹ antimono (λS'. ⟦diamond a f⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 boxdiamondmonoantimono)
  ultimately show "(¬ dependvar (diamond a f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦diamond a f⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (¬ dependvar (diamond a f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M i False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦diamond a f⟧ M e(i := S')))" by auto
next
  fix f i e
  assume assum1: "(⋀i e. (notdependalloccursposnegi f M i True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦f⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (notdependalloccursposnegi f M i False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦f⟧ M e(i := S'))))"
  have "¬ dependvar (nu f) M i ⟶ (mono (λS'. ⟦nu f⟧ M e(i := S')) ∧ antimono (λS'. ⟦nu f⟧ M e(i := S')))" using notdependsmono by metis
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) True ⟹ mono (λS'. ⟦nu f⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 numumono)
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) False ⟹ antimono (λS'. ⟦nu f⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 numuantimono)
  ultimately show "(¬ dependvar (nu f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦nu f⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (¬ dependvar (nu f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦nu f⟧ M e(i := S')))" by auto
  have "¬ dependvar (mu f) M i ⟶ (mono (λS'. ⟦mu f⟧ M e(i := S')) ∧ antimono (λS'. ⟦mu f⟧ M e(i := S')))" using notdependsmono by metis
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) True ⟹ mono (λS'. ⟦mu f⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 numumono)
  moreover have "notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) False ⟹ antimono (λS'. ⟦mu f⟧ M e(i := S'))" by (auto simp: assum1 numuantimono)
  ultimately show "(¬ dependvar (mu f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) True ⟶ mono (λS'. ⟦mu f⟧ M e(i := S'))) ∧ (¬ dependvar (mu f) M i ∨ notdependalloccursposnegi f M (Suc i) False ⟶ antimono (λS'. ⟦mu f⟧ M e(i := S')))" by auto
qed

text ‹‹notdependalloccursposnegi› can be evaluated on formulas so that the following lemma can be used
to prove that its transformer is monotone.›

lemma monotonicitynotdependcoro : 
  shows "notdependalloccursposnegi f M 0 True ⟹ mono (transformer f M e)"
  and "notdependalloccursposnegi f M 0 False ⟹ antimono (transformer f M e)"
  apply (simp_all add: transformerdef)
proof-
  have "∀S''. notdependalloccursposnegi f M 0 True ⟶ mono (λS'.(⟦f⟧ M ((newenvironment e S'')(0 := S'))))" using monotonicitynotdepend by metis
  thus "notdependalloccursposnegi f M 0 True ⟹ mono (λS'.(⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')))" by auto
next
  have "∀S''. notdependalloccursposnegi f M 0 False ⟶ antimono (λS'.(⟦f⟧ M ((newenvironment e S'')(0 := S'))))" using monotonicitynotdepend by metis
  thus "notdependalloccursposnegi f M 0 False ⟹ antimono (λS'.(⟦f⟧ M (newenvironment e S')))" by auto
qed

section ‹Approximation of ‹nu› and ‹mu›.›

lemma gfp_eq_nu [simp] :
"gfp (transformer f M e) = ⟦nu f⟧ M e"
  by (simp add: gfp_def transformer_def)

lemma lfp_eq_mu [simp] :
"lfp (transformer f M e) = ⟦mu f⟧ M e"
  by (simp add: lfp_def transformer_def)

lemma monosubset :
  assumes "mono f"
  shows "(f S' ⊆ S' ⟶ (f^^(Suc i)) S' ⊆ (f^^i) S') ∧
    (S' ⊆ f S' ⟶ (f^^ i) S' ⊆ (f^^(Suc i)) S')"
  apply (induct i)
  using assms apply (simp_all add: mono_def)
  done

lemma fpoweriplusn : 
  assumes "((f :: 'a ⇒ 'a)^^i) S' = (f^^(Suc i)) S'"
  shows "(f^^(i + n)) S' = (f^^(Suc i + n)) S'" 
  apply (induct n)
  using assms apply simp
proof-
  fix n
  assume "(f ^^ (i + n)) S' = (f ^^ (Suc i + n)) S'"
  hence "f ((f ^^ (i + n)) S') = f ((f ^^ Suc (i + n)) S')" by simp
  thus "(f ^^ (i + Suc n)) S' = (f ^^ (Suc i + Suc n)) S'" by simp
qed

lemma fixpointmono:
  assumes "mono (f :: ('s set ⇒ 's set))"
  and "finite (UNIV :: 's set)"
  and "S' ⊆ f S' ∨ f S' ⊆ S'"
  shows "∃n ≤ card(UNIV :: 's set). (f^^n) S' = (f^^(Suc n)) S'"
proof (rule ccontr)
  assume "¬ (∃n≤card(UNIV :: 's set).((f ^^ n) S') = ((f ^^ Suc n) S'))"
  hence assum1 : "∀n≤card(UNIV :: 's set).((f ^^ n) S') ≠ ((f ^^ Suc n) S')" by auto
  {
    assume assum2 : "S' ⊆ f S'"
    have  "∀n ≤ Suc (card(UNIV :: 's set)). card ((f ^^ n) S') ≥ n"
    proof
      fix n
      show "n ≤ Suc (card(UNIV :: 's set)) ⟶ n ≤ card ((f ^^ n) S')"
        apply (induct n)
        apply simp
      proof
        fix n
        assume assum3: "n ≤ Suc (card (UNIV :: 's set)) ⟶ n ≤ card ((f ^^ n) S')"
        assume assum4 : "Suc n ≤ Suc (card (UNIV :: 's set))"
        hence "(f ^^ n) S' ≠ (f ^^ (Suc n)) S'" using assum1 by simp
        moreover have "(f ^^ n) S' ⊆ (f ^^ (Suc n)) S'" using assms(1) assum2 monosubset by blast 
        ultimately have "(f ^^ n) S' ⊂ (f ^^ (Suc n)) S'" by simp
        moreover have "finite ((f ^^ Suc n) S')" using assms(2) rev_finite_subset by auto
        ultimately have "card ((f ^^ n) S') < card ((f ^^ Suc n) S')" using psubset_card_mono by metis
        thus "Suc n ≤ card ((f ^^ Suc n) S')" using assum3 assum4 by simp
      qed
    qed
    hence contradiction1 : "card ((f ^^ Suc (card(UNIV :: 's set))) S') ≥  Suc (card(UNIV :: 's set))" by auto
    have contradiction2: "card ((f ^^ Suc (card(UNIV :: 's set))) S') ≤ card(UNIV :: 's set)" using assms(2) card_mono by auto
    have False using contradiction1 contradiction2 by auto
  }
  moreover{
    assume assum2 : "f S' ⊆ S'"
    have  "∀n ≤ Suc (card(UNIV :: 's set)). card ((f ^^ n) S') < Suc(card(UNIV :: 's set)) - n"
    proof
      fix n
      show "n ≤ Suc (card(UNIV :: 's set)) ⟶ card ((f ^^ n) S') < Suc (card(UNIV :: 's set)) - n"
        apply (induct n)
        apply (simp add : assms(2) card_mono less_Suc_eq_le)
      proof
        fix n
        assume assum3: "n ≤ Suc (card (UNIV :: 's set)) ⟶ card ((f ^^ n) S') < Suc(card (UNIV :: 's set)) - n"
        assume assum4 : "Suc n ≤ Suc (card (UNIV :: 's set))"
        hence "(f ^^ n) S' ≠ (f ^^ (Suc n)) S'" using assum1 by simp
        moreover have "(f ^^ (Suc n)) S' ⊆ (f ^^ n) S'" using assms(1) assum2 monosubset by blast 
        ultimately have "(f ^^ (Suc n)) S' ⊂ (f ^^  n) S'" using psubset_eq by simp
        moreover have "finite ((f ^^ n) S')" using assms(2) rev_finite_subset by auto
        ultimately have "card ((f ^^ (Suc n)) S') < card ((f ^^ n) S')" using psubset_card_mono by metis
        thus "card ((f ^^ Suc n) S') < Suc(card (UNIV :: 's set)) - (Suc n)" using assum3 assum4 by simp
      qed
    qed
    hence "card ((f ^^ Suc (card(UNIV :: 's set))) UNIV) <  0" by auto
    hence False by auto
  }
  ultimately show False using assms(3) by auto
qed

lemma gfp_monofin [simp] :
  assumes "finite (UNIV :: 's set)"
  and "mono (f :: 's set ⇒ 's set)"
  shows "(f^^(card (UNIV :: 's set))) UNIV = gfp f"
proof-
  have "∃n ≤ card(UNIV :: 's set). (f^^n) (UNIV) = (f^^(Suc n)) (UNIV)" using assms fixpointmono by blast
  then obtain n where assum2: "n ≤ card (UNIV :: 's set) ∧  (f^^n) (UNIV) = (f^^(Suc n)) (UNIV)" by auto
  hence "(f ^^ (n + (card (UNIV :: 's set) - n))) (UNIV) = (f ^^ (Suc n +  (card (UNIV :: 's set) - n))) (UNIV)" using fpoweriplusn by metis
  hence "(f^^(card (UNIV :: 's set)))(UNIV) = (f^^Suc(card (UNIV :: 's set)))(UNIV)" using assum2 by auto
  thus ?thesis using gfp_Kleene_iter assms(2) by blast
qed

lemma lfp_monofin [simp] :
  assumes "finite (UNIV :: 's set)"
  and "mono (f :: 's set ⇒ 's set)"
  shows "(f^^(card (UNIV :: 's set))) {} = lfp f"
proof-
  have "∃n ≤ card(UNIV :: 's set). (f^^n) {} = (f^^(Suc n)) {}" using assms fixpointmono by blast
  then obtain n where assum2: "n ≤ card (UNIV :: 's set) ∧  (f^^n) {} = (f^^(Suc n)) {}" by auto
  hence "(f ^^ (n + (card (UNIV :: 's set) - n))) {} = (f ^^ (Suc n +  (card (UNIV :: 's set) - n))) {}" using fpoweriplusn by metis
  hence "(f^^(card (UNIV :: 's set))){} = (f^^Suc(card (UNIV :: 's set))){}" using assum2 by auto
  thus ?thesis using lfp_Kleene_iter assms(2) by blast
qed

lemma transformer_eq_nu :
  fixes M :: "('a, 's) lts"
  assumes "finite (UNIV :: 's set)"
  and "mono (transformer f M e)"
  shows "⟦nu f⟧ M e = ((transformer f M e)^^(card (UNIV :: 's set)))(UNIV)"
  using assms by auto 

lemma transformer_eq_mu :
  fixes M :: "('a, 's) lts"
  assumes "finite (UNIV :: 's set)"
  and "mono (transformer f M e)"
  shows "⟦mu f⟧ M e = ((transformer f M e)^^(card (UNIV :: 's set))){}"
  using assms by auto

end
